title: "Inspur AI Servers Demonstrate Leading Performance in the Latest MLPerf™ Training v1.0 Benchmarks"
excerpt: "Recently, MLCommons™, a well-known open engineering consortium, released new results for MLPerf™ Training v1.0, the organization's machine learning training performance benchmark suite. Inspur topped the list of single node performance in four out of eight tasks in the Closed division of the MLPerf™ Training v1."
